title: Fall at your fingertips
text: Ordering your fall favourites is a snap with the app. Join StarbucksÂ® Rewards and tap into fall.

title: Welcome home, pumpkin
text: Fall favourites return with the blissful Pumpkin Spice Latte and smooth Pumpkin Cream Cold Brew.

title: Layers of baked apple yum
text: Try the new nondairy Apple Crisp Oat Macchiato with creamy oat beverage.

title: Picks of the patch
text: Choose a comforting classic: Pumpkin Cream Cheese Muffin, Pumpkin & Pepita Loaf or Pumpkin Scone.
